Tabloid editors are also known to keep close watch over their reporters. No one who knows how a newspaper works, let alone a well-run British newspaper, has ever been able to understand for one second why a very effective editor wouldn't have at least asked his royal reporter where a stream of very strong scoops had come from, said an editor at another tabloid who asked not to be quoted by name because he was not authorized to speak publicly to the press. I've now scored 40 points on the highest stage you can ever score, said Linas Kleiza , whose previous career-high of 29 came March 15 against the Los Angeles Lakers.
